name: Focus (Sahir Virmani)
description: Focus is my submission for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. It's a short casual game about a photographer who's camera is going "out of control" (game jam theme). Each time you take a picture your camera settings change. Arrange your scenes by moving objects into the frame of the camera and clicking photos. Take pictures of all the items on your list to finish the game!
